title: Substitute
text: Since we know $$d=350$$ and $$r=70$$, we can substitute $$350$$ for $$d$$ and $$70$$ for $$r$$ into the equation, which gives us $$350=70t$$.

title: Isolate
text: To isolate $$t$$, we can divide both sides by $$70$$.
